item.title: Coursera Fullstack Course
item.description: I am currently studying the Full Stack Web Development Specialization course offered by the Coursera online education organization. The second part of the course covers the Bootstrap framework, which we are using to build an example web site. Each week we are adding new features. The result can be seen here and the source code for the site here

item.title: Angular Spring Security Example
item.description: Here is a great article describing how to add authentication to your Angular App. In this example they are serving the resources from a separate server using spring boot. The server code is programmed in Groovy. For those (like myself) not familiar with Groovy I decided to reimplement the server in Java. You can see this example running at Angular Authentication example and the source code here Angular Client and Java Server. Login credentials are user name: user and password password
